Package controllers

package controllers
  • Class
    Description
    ApplicationManager
    ApplicationManager manages application workflows using FSM.
    ApplicationRepository
    Repository for applications.
    ApplicationSerializer
    Implements the serializing and deserializing of Application entity and the relevant metadata for its file
    CompanyRepresentativeSerializer
    Implements the serializing and deserializing of CompanyRepresentative entity and the relevant metadata for its file
    DataPersistence<T>
    Abstraction for persistence layer.
    Decouples Manager from FileHandler implementation.
    FileApplicationPersistence
    Concrete implementation from DataPersistence.
    FileHandler<T>
    Handles reading and writing serialized entities to a file.
    FileInternshipPersistence
    Concrete implementation from DataPersistence.
    InternshipApprovalService
    Handles approval and rejection workflows for internship listings.
    InternshipApprovalService.InternshipNotFoundException
    Custom exception for when internship is not found
    InternshipApprovalService.InvalidStateException
    Custom exception for invalid state transitions
    InternshipManager
    InternshipManager coordinates between the @see InternshipRepository, @see InternshipApprovalService, and @see InternshipQueryService.
    InternshipQueryService
    Handles read-only query and filtering operations on internships.
    InternshipRepository
    Repository for internship data access.
    InternshipSerializer
    Implements the serializing and deserializing of Internship entity and the relevant metadata for its file
    ListingPolicy
    Encapsulates requirements for creating internship listings.
    ReportGenerator
    REPORT GENERATOR CLASS
    A ReportGenerator object provides comprehensive reporting capabilities for the internship management system.

    Key functionalities include: Generate reports filtered by internship status Generate reports filtered by preferred major Generate reports filtered by internship level Generate reports filtered by company name Generate reports for a specific student's applications Generate summary reports for the entire system Generate custom reports with multiple filters
    This class reuses existing manager APIs from ApplicationManager, InternshipManager, and UserManager.
    Serializer<T>
    Interface that defines the contract for serializing and deserialzing entities of type T
    StaffSerializer
    Implements the serializing and deserializing of staff entity and the relevant metadata for its file
    StandardListingPolicy
    Standard implementation of ListingPolicy with the required limits by assignment briefing.
    Can be extended or replaced for different implementations.
    StudentSerializer
    Implements the serializing and deserializing of student entity and the relevant metadata for its file
    UserManager
    The User Manager will be in charge of logging in and logging out.
